Package lib.homies.framework.playerdata

Interface PlayerDataService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPlayerDataService
public interface PlayerDataService
A platform-agnostic interface for managing player-specific data. This service allows framework developers to store and retrieve PlayerData for HomiesPlayers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<PlayerData>
    getPlayerData(String uuid)
    Retrieves the PlayerData for a given player UUID.
    Optional<PlayerData>
    getPlayerData(HomiesPlayer player)
    Retrieves the PlayerData for a given HomiesPlayer.
    void
    savePlayerData(PlayerData playerData)
    Saves the provided PlayerData object to the database.

  • Method Details

    • getPlayerData

      Optional<PlayerData> getPlayerData(HomiesPlayer player)
      Retrieves the PlayerData for a given HomiesPlayer. This method uses the player's unique ID to fetch data from the database.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer whose data is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the PlayerData if found, otherwise Optional.empty().

    • savePlayerData

      void savePlayerData(PlayerData playerData)
      Saves the provided PlayerData object to the database. This will either create new data or update existing data based on the player's UUID.
      Parameters:
      playerData - The PlayerData object to save.

    • getPlayerData

      Optional<PlayerData> getPlayerData(String uuid)
      Retrieves the PlayerData for a given player UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The String representation of the UUID of the player whose data is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the PlayerData if found, otherwise Optional.empty().
